mapper.update:
update KBS_QUESTION_ARTICLE
QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ARTICLE_TYPE = #{articleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARTICLE_TITLE = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
MAP_SOURCE = #{mapSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_ID = #{mapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_FLAG = #{syncFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYNC_TIME = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFICATION_DATE = #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARTICLE_BLOCK = #{articleBlock,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION_ARTICLE WHERE CREATION_DATE > #{lastCreateTime} ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION_ARTICLE ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION_ARTICLE WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE >= CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION_ARTICLE WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE >= #{lastUpdateTime} ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
